data: The Opexa Portal SDK provides createAccount() method to register new users on the platform. This guide offers a detailed explanation of how to use this method to implement user registration functionality in your application.
data.using-the-createaccount-method#Using the:
The createAccount() method is designed to handle the registration of new users with various required and optional parameters. Here's how you can use it:
sdk.createAccount(input);

data: Welcome to Opexa Portal SDK documentation!
data.what-is-opexa-portal-sdk#What is Opexa P: The Opexa Portal SDK is a powerful and flexible library designed to simplify integration with the Opexa. It provides developers with a comprehensive set of tools and functions to seamlessly integrate Opexa's gaming platform features into their applications.
data.get-started#Get Started: To get started, navigate to the Installation page.

data: The Opexa Portal SDK provides account() method to retrieve current user's details. This guide offers a detailed explanation of how to use this method to access and utilize user-specific information in your application.
data.using-the-account-method#Using the accou:
The account() method is designed to fetch details about the current authenticated user. Here's how you can use it:
sdk.account();

data:
To use the Opexa Portal SDK in your project, you need to configure it properly. This guide will walk you through the setup process.First, install the SDK using npm:
npm install @opexa/portal-sdk
